title: Just Hit 1000 Wins! Where's my RIOTER :D:D:D

replies.body: Awesome :D, I sent you a friend invite

Try joining the "PlayWithRiot" chat room. I know that Gypsylord uses to hang in there quite a bit as well as a few others. If you're lucky (and mention the 100th win part), you can usually hook up a game with one or more.
Thanks man, I will try that!
